name: Mega Marble Mix
description:
Roll your marble to the finish! Can you get the fastest time? Compete with your friends and see who holds and keeps the record!

Mega Marble Mix is inspired by Super Monkey Ball and Rolled Out. This game was created for a school assignment at DAE, Belgium.

SPEEDRUN MODE

Play each level seperately and try to get the fastest time. You can also collect all 3 pickups in each level. 

REMIX MODE

Play every level in a row (shuffled!) to get the fastest total time. You only have 3 lives to complete Remix Mode, so it won't be easy!  

FEATURES
  • Play 7 unique, fun and interesting levels
  • Find all 3 pickups in each level
  • Keep track of your fastest times 
  • Complete Remix Mode 
CONTROLS

WASD or the arrow keys. Press R to restart and P to pause. 

The sound and music in this game are from various Super Monkey Ball games.
